Package org.zone.region.flag

Interface FlagType<F extends Flag>

Type Parameters:
F - The class type of the attached flag
All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<FlagType<?>>, Identifiable
All Known Subinterfaces:
FlagType.TaggedFlagType<F>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockBreakFlagType, BlockPlaceFlagType, DoorInteractionFlagType, EcoFlagType, EditingFlagType, EntityDamagePlayerFlagType, GreetingsFlagType, ItemFrameInteractFlagType, LeavingFlagType, MembersFlagType, PlayerFallDamageFlagType, PreventMonsterFlagType, PreventPlayersFlagType, TagsFlagType
public interface FlagType<F extends Flag> extends Identifiable, Comparable<FlagType<?>>
A flag type is the specific type of a flag, each flag should have a unique FlagType which is designed to serialize and deserialize the flag as well as provide generic metadata about the flag itself
